channel.title: Shameless self-promotion: Ops tools for hackers
channel.description:
Hello fellow 0x00sec-ers!
I just had a good talk with @pry0cc about doing some posts within my specialty, operations. I firmly believe that a strong foundation in operations is essential for any aspiring hacker, as you need to understand the systems you're breaking. To that end, I will be cross-posting articles I write on my own blog here with a special focus on using ops tools for evil.
This first article (in what _might_ be a series) is less evil, still fun. I used our very own pet chatbot, MissMoneyPenney, to demonstrate two really cool tools, Consul and consul-template. Check it out, let me know your thoughts, and tell me how you might want to use something like Consul and consul-template for bad things.
http://blog.fraq.io/tech/consul-template/
